'''Ultamatix''' is a tool based on [[Automatix (software)|automatix]] that automates the addition of [[applications]], [[codecs]], [[fonts]] and [[libraries]] not provided directly by the software repositories of [[Debian]]-based distributions ([[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] and others).

'''Ultamatix''' is a tool based on [[Automatix (software)|automatix]] that automates the addition of [[applications]], [[codecs]], [[fonts]] and [[libraries]] not provided directly by the software repositories of [[Debian]]-based distributions like [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]].
Ultamatix currently allows the menu-driven installation of 101 different âcapabilitiesâ, including programs such as the Flash plugin, [[Adobe Reader]], multimedia [[codec]]s, MP3 support, [[Windows Media Audio]]) and fonts, and programming [[compiler]]s.
